description: use single space for AND operator and use ''OR" for the OR operator. Example= apples OR (grapes bananas). For more information and operators go to: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/tweets/search/integrate/build-a-query#build

the most recent possible date and time for retrieved tweets in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format
maximum amount of tweets per tweet page. Must be between 10 and 500
